news_header: Sandy Spring Bancorp, OneMain Holdings, and WisdomTree will trade ex-dividend on 2/12/25, with respective dividends announced.
news_original_title: Ex-Dividend Reminder: Sandy Spring Bancorp, OneMain Holdings and WisdomTree
news_text: On February 12, 2025, Sandy Spring Bancorp Inc (SASR), OneMain Holdings Inc (OMF), and WisdomTree Inc (WT) will trade ex-dividend for their upcoming dividends. SASR will pay $0.34 on February 19, OMF will pay $1.04 on February 20, and WT will pay $0.03 on February 26. The dividends represent approximately 0.99%, 1.84%, and 0.31% of their respective stock prices, indicating expected price drops on the ex-dividend date. Historical dividend data suggests stability, with estimated annual yields of 3.95% for SASR, 7.36% for OMF, and 1.26% for WT.
